DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_15_01: What are you doing here all naked?
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_03_01: My name is Artur and I am in the process of regretting all my life decisions.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_03_02: My whole family urged me - join the monastery, you will meet new people and see a different perspective on the world.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_03_03: And now? I'm running around like an idiot looking for my stuff because my fellow novices felt like making jokes.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Why_15_01: Why did they do this to you?
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Why_03_02: How would I know? I don't know what might be in those empty heads.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Why_03_03: Admittedly, I was supposed to be in charge of the monastery library, and the angry Master Othekar could punish all the novices...
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Why_03_04: But that's still no reason to abuse a good friend like that!
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_What_03_02: They didn't steal it. They scattered it across the roofs of the monastery. Adanos be my witness, if I become a mage, the same thing will happen to every one of them.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Help_15_01: Let me help you with your search.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Help_03_02: Really? That's great, I knew there were still good people in the world.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Help_03_03: I'm looking for my novice robe, fighting staff, and journal with notes.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Help_03_04: I was told they scattered everything on the roof of the monastery, so without the right spell we won't get it.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Help_03_05: Here, this many scrolls should be enough.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Later_15_01: Good luck with your search. It's time for me to go.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Start_Later_03_02: Would you leave a man in need? You are no different from any other novice in this monastery.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_15_03: Unfortunately, I can't help you with your search anymore.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_03_04: You're leaving me the way my family left me, right? Sure, make fun of me. We'll see who laughs last.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_15_05: I found everything. Here you go.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_03_06: Thanks man, you did me a huge favor.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_03_07: Here, I took this potion from one of the mages, it's not likely to be of much use to me.
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_15_08: Is it appropriate for a novice to steal?
DIA_Artur_SQ506_Finish_03_09: Is it appropriate for a novice to bully his colleague?
